'''Favonius Fir Door''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that comes with the [[Mondstadt Mansion: Windward Manor]].

==Trivia==
The confinement room regular mentioned in the description is [[Klee]], since the room has become pretty much her property.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Wood (NPC)}}</ref>
